Index

A E G H M R S T 
All Classes|All Packages

A

attomenu - package attomenu
Provides classes to simplify writing a multi-level menu-driven console application, using simple constructs analogous to the javax.swing library.

E

equals(Object) - Method in class attomenu.Menu
Compares the specified object with this menu for equality.
equals(Object) - Method in class attomenu.MenuItem
Compares the specified object with this menuItem for equality.
EXIT_CHAR - Static variable in class attomenu.Menu
The char command to exit the menu ('x' is default, ' ' is not permitted).

G

getKey() - Method in class attomenu.MenuItem
Returns the alternate char to select this MenuItem (space if unset)

H

hashCode() - Method in class attomenu.Menu
Returns the hash code value for this menu.
hashCode() - Method in class attomenu.MenuItem
Returns the hash code value for this menuItem.

M

Menu - Class in attomenu
A simple multi-level console menu system using the Observer pattern.
Menu(Object, Object, MenuItem...) - Constructor for class attomenu.Menu
Constructs a new Menu with all menu items and associated callbacks.
MenuItem - Class in attomenu
Associates menu text with a response when selected.
MenuItem(Object, Runnable) - Constructor for class attomenu.MenuItem
Initializes a MenuItem object with no character key.
MenuItem(Object, Runnable, char) - Constructor for class attomenu.MenuItem
Initializes a MenuItem object with an optional character key.

R

run() - Method in class attomenu.Menu
The main loop that repeatedly calls runOnce until the user enters EXIT_CHAR.
run() - Method in class attomenu.MenuItem
Calls the menuResponse for this menu item.
runOnce() - Method in class attomenu.Menu
Displays the menu and executes the callback for one selection by the user.

S

select(Object, Object[]) - Static method in class attomenu.Menu
Provides a menu containing all array members so the user can select one.
select(Object, List<E>) - Static method in class attomenu.Menu
Provides a menu containing all list members so the user can select one.
selectFile(Object, File, FilenameFilter) - Static method in class attomenu.Menu
Navigates the filesystem so the user can select a file or directory.
SHOW_CHAR - Static variable in class attomenu.Menu
Enables character key in menus when available.
SHOW_INT - Static variable in class attomenu.Menu
Enables integer key in menus (always shown if no character key is available).

T

toString() - Method in class attomenu.Menu
Formats this menu for presentation to the user.
toString() - Method in class attomenu.MenuItem
Returns the result of the menuText toString() method.
